title: Let's teach kids to code
description: Coding isn't just for computer whizzes, says Mitch Resnick of MIT Media Lab -- it's for everyone. In a fun, demo-filled talk Resnick outlines the benefits of teaching kids to code, so they can do more than just use new tech toys but also create them.
author: Mitch Resnick
keywords: TED, talks, Internet, TEDx, children, computers, education, parenting, technology, youth, code
